data.title: Raleigh Area Traffic
data.meta_description: Get traffic updates on Raleigh traffic and surrounding areas before you head out with ABC11. Stay updated with real-time traffic maps and freeway trip times.
data.text:
Woman dead, hit by car in Raleigh: police

Drivers beware: School buses rolling out for the new school year

Driver troopers say started high-speed chase was out of jail on bond

NC 540 will not open this month, due to erosion

New 18-mile extension of N.C. 540 to open this month

1 person seriously injured after vehicle hits lawnmower

4 people seriously injured in Harnett County crash

Woman killed in 2 vehicle crash in Dunn

Northbound lane of NC 55 in Durham closed after deadly crash

15-year-old riding in golf cart dies in head-on crash with vehicle

Man killed, 1 other injured in head-on crash in Fayetteville

Former Fayetteville basketball stand out killed in crash

Motorcyclist dies after crashing into two vehicles in Durham: police

Blue Ridge Road closes due to gas leak in Raleigh

Man dead after car slides off road into creek: Durham Fire

Man struck and killed by vehicle on I-40 westbound in Durham

Pickup hits Fayetteville home after driver loses control in curve

Malfunctioning NC traffic signals to flash red in all directions
